list.name: Default
list.comment: Rename a few entities, add foreign key references

task.summary: Default task
Integration and bug fixes
More integration and bug fixes.
Added magic categories to the SP allocation menu.
Fix bugs with inventory system. Stubbing out basic Magic system functionality. Added mana regeneration logic.
Fix off by one error on SP allocation cost. Add Mana bar to the rest menu.
Made magic system more data-driven
Ability equipping menu
Implemented 29 abilities
Add Patch Up ability. Fix impact script namespacing
Implement functionality for Medic and Fixer abilities.
Run OnEquip and OnUnequip ability methods after ability data is persisted to DB. Recalc inventory limits after equipping or unequipping Strong Back ability.

Updated starting door conversation. Fix issue with magic system on new chars (erroring out because PlayerCharacter not in DB). Fixed off by one issue on the storage chest. Added generic store script. Added sit script.
Add mining/logging for resource gathering. Add Lumberjack / Miner abilities. Fix bug with swapped functionality on the OmniTool.
Fix sanctuary granting
Add iron as a possible required resource for structure system
Grant the Item Durability item property to any item automatically if it's missing it whenever SetDurability or GetDurability are called.
Add abilities for reducing durability loss chance while mining and logging.
Grant EXP when zombies are killed.
Fix outfit menu text. Remove dye clothes option from rest menu since it's already in the modify clothes menu.
Dual Wield: Unequip and re-equip any off hand weapon after unequipping or equipping the ability.
Change base time for blind from 60 seconds to 30 seconds.
Reduce base duration of Turn Undead ability
Add IsHostile method to all abilities. Check PVP Sanctuary setting on attacker and target for hostile abilities.
Give 50 Darts to new characters. Make starting bread undroppable and make all cursed items exempt from inventory limits.
Add Blueprint Merchant conversation
Added profession system. Fixed bug with PlayerEntity changes being overwritten on some upgrade purchases. Added convo for ability merchant. Integrated profession bonuses into existing systems.
Show level cap in rest menu.
Fix bug with applying custom changes when SP is reset.
Force profession selection before entering the game. Take all gold from player when they select a starting location.
Add option for starting at Zodiac Outpost. Change BP and ability disc merchants to look for NEAREST merchant object by tag.
Change flavor text for starting locations. Add Trash Can script events.
Recalculate item limits after using items.
Stub out database entities for the quest system
Rename a few entities, add foreign key references
